subject: Re: FW: [ALERT] Possible error on your Gravity to Xero - Huntley Zap
preview: Great. Thank you.  Kind Regards,  AMY SMITH CEO | CREATIVE DIRECTOR  02 8310 2285 AMY@HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

full_threads.body:
Great. Thank you.

Kind Regards,

AMY SMITH CEO | CREATIVE DIRECTOR
 02 8310 2285 AMY@HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU HUNTLEYANDCO.COM.AU

Hi Amy,

I hope you’ve been doing well!

Thanks for flagging this with me. I’ve taken a look and it seems the user hello@huntleyandco.com.au had an empty “Company Name” field, which Zapier then tried to pass through to Xero. That’s what triggered the error.

To prevent this from happening again, I’ve set a default so that if the field is empty, it will now use “Huntley” instead. That should stop these alerts from coming through in future.

Lets keep an eye on it over the next few days, and let me know if you see any more errors — I’ll be happy to jump back in.

Hi Amy,

Thanks for flagging this—really sorry to hear you’re running into issues with Zapier.

We’ll take a closer look and have already forwarded this to our developers for checking. We’ll keep you posted as soon as we have an update.

Thanks again for your patience!

action.text: Workflow **Expert Plan tickets tag as urgent** was triggered
Workflow **Assign Expert Plan (AC - Apr 16)** was triggered

Thank you.
